name: woolentor/product-grid-magazine
title: WL: Product Grid Magazine
description: Display Product Grid Magazine with grid and list layouts.

style.selector: {{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li a,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li span,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-load-more-btn{ font-size: {{pagination_typography}}; }
{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li a,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li span,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-load-more-btn

{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li a,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li span:not(.dots),{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-load-more-btn{ border-radius:{{pagination_border_radius}}; }
{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li a,{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-pagination ul li span:not(.dots),{{WOOLENTOR_WRAPPER}} .woolentor-load-more-btn{ padding:{{pagination_padding}}; }
